lines: aaj devaveena kee shaadee kee risepshan thee
amit subah se hee ghar aur yoonivarsitee klab ke beech bhaagadaud kar raha tha
subah se keval ek hee baar vah veena se mila tha
veena ko laga kuchh poochhana chaahata tha vah lekin kisee sankochavash vah poochh na saka
aur yah baat use shaam ko samajh aa gaee thee jab deharaadoon se priya geeta va prem aa gae the
unhen aaya dekhakar amit kee aankhon mein jo chamak aaee thee use vah chhipa na saka tha
subah se veena ko vah jitana vyast lag raha tha ab utana hee nishchint laga use
ab kal kee tarah vah veena ke aasapaas mandara raha tha
prem to dev ke saath doosare kisee kamare mein tha aur veena apanee bahanon ke saath hanseethitholee mein magn thee
veena ke chehare kee raunak kaheen bhee aisa kuchh aabhaas nahin karava rahee thee ki raat mein dev aur usake beech kuchh gambheer vaartaalaap hua hai
teesaree baar jab amit aaya to veena ne use baithane ko kaha
tab amit bola  kaise baithoon bhaabhee abhee to saans lene kee phursat bhee nahin hai
yah to main dekh rahee hoon lekin abhee kuchh der se lagata hai tum kuchh bor ho rahe ho
shaayad sab kaam poora ho chuka hai
veena ko amit ke vyavahaar se usake kaam mein vyast rahane kee aadat se sukhad anubhooti ho rahee thee
mera kaam to poora ho chuka hai
bas ab taiyaar hona hai sabako
amit ko sabako taiyaar karane kee bhee jimmedaaree thee
haan sabhee taiyaar honge
tum sabase pahale shuroo ho jao
veena ne muskuraate hue usase kaha
main sabase pahale kaise ho sakata hoon ghar mehamaanon se bhara hai
sabako taiyaar karake hee mujhe mauka milega taiyaar hone ka
aur jaise use kuchh aur yaad aaya  are komal bhaabhee aapako byootee sailoon le jaane vaalee theen na na jaane kya kar rahee hain  dekhakar aata hoon
yah kahakar vah phir baahar nikal gaya
veena usakee baat sunakar keval muskura bhar dee
usane apanee bahan priya va geeta kee or dekha
ve bhee amit kee or dekh muskura rahee theen
amit kamare se nikala to veena ne kaha
bahut achchha ladaka hai
sabaka dhyaan rakhata hai
aapaka to kuchh jyaada hee rakh raha hai
geeta ne kaha
haan lekin sabake lie har kaam karane ko taiyaar rahata hai
kal se dekh rahee hoon saare ghar mein chhaaya hua hai
aur jaise use kuchh yaad ho aaya ho vah priya va geeta se bolee  tum ekado din rukogee na
bhaiya kah rahe the kal chale jaenge
priya ne kaha
nahin kal nahin
abhee vah pooree baat kah bhee na paee thee ki amit phir se aa gaya
amit ne veena ka shabd sun liya tha  kal nahin kya  usane poochh liya
veena muskuraatee huee bolee  yoon hee priya kah rahee thee kal vaapis jaane ke lie
are kal hee  priya kee or dekha usane phir veena ko kaha
kal kyon jaengee do chaar din ruk kar jaen
inhonne dillee nahin dekhee hogee
main sab ghuma doonga
geeta sunakar khush ho gaee
lekin priya ne kaha  vaise bhee main kahaan ruk sakatee hoon agale haphte mere praiktikal shuroo hone hain
tabhee komal bheetar aa gaee
usako dekhakar amit ka hausala aur badh gaya
vah usee kee or aamukh hokar bola  hamen kya aitaraaj ho sakata hai
lekin komal bhaabhee jaane degee tab na
kisako jaane degee jara main bhee to jaanoon  komal ne kaha
priya va geeta ko
veena ne bataaya
are yah kaise ho sakata hai
is haphte hamaare saath rahen
dillee ghoomen
agale haphte tum va dev deharaadoon chakkar lagaane jaoge hee
tumhaare saath hee vaapis chalee jaengee
komal jaise amit ke man kee chaahana ko bhaanp chukee thee amit ko muskuraate dekhakar phir bolee  kyon amit theek rahega na
haanhaan main to pahale hee kah raha tha
lekin komal kee arthapoorn muskuraahat dekhakar vah jhempasa gaya
tab komal veena ko lekar byootee sailoon jaane ko chal dee
amit shesh taiyaaree mein jut gaya
paartee badee dhoomadhaam se sampann ho gaee
veena ka man khush ho gaya
dev ke naaterishtedaar dev ke mitr use jitane pyaar se mile aur usane yah baarabaar mahasoos kiya ki apane samaaj mein dev kee bahut ijjat hai
sabhee usake gyaan kee usake svabhaav kee prashansa kar rahe the
veena ko yah sab dekhakar svayan par garv mahasoos hua
priya va geeta bhee aisa dekhakar bahut khush hueen
prem ko to amit ne apane paas se hilane hee na diya tha
paartee se lautakar dev va veena jab apane kamare mein aa gae
tab dev ne poochha veena se  kaisa laga sab tumhen
bahut achchha
veena ne muskuraate hue dev ko dekhate hue kaha
tab tak dev ne sigaret sulaga lee thee
use aisa karate dekhakar veena ne kaha  aapako sigaret nahin peenee chaahie
kuchh nahin hota isase
dev ne laaparavaahee se kaha
tabhee use kuchh yaad aaya bola  mainne baaton hee baaton mein ramesh bhaee se poochha tha
unhen bataaya ki tum mere opareshan ke baare mein kuchh nahin jaanateen
ramesh bhaee is baat ko lekar pareshaan ho gae
unhen mainne aur nahin kureda
ab kya sach hai aur kya jhooth yah to bata paana mushkil hai main svayan ko hee gunaahagaar mahasoos kar raha hoon
veena kee muskuraahat phir lupt ho gaee
bolee  dekhie main ab is bahas mein nahin padana chaahatee
mujhe jo maaloom tha vah mainne aapako bata diya hai
aur ab main baarabaar us baat ko sochakar apane mastishk ka santulan nahin bigaadana chaahatee
mujhe aapakee baat par vishvaas karane ko jee chaahata hai aur iseelie mere man mein ab koee gila nahin hai
veena kee aankhen nam ho aaee theen
vah kahatee rahee  mainne aap jaise pati kee hee kalpana kee thee aur vah meree pooree ho gaee
ab mere man mein sada yahee chaahana rahegee ki mere aur aapake beech ekadoosare ko samajhane kee bhaavana banee rahe
aap ab achchhebhale hain
main to yahee praarthana karatee rahoongee ki aap hamesha tandurust rahen
dev shaayad yahee sunana chaah raha tha
apane man kee aavaaz apanee har ichchha ko ek nae roop mein nikharate dekhane kee chaah itanee balavatee ho gaee thee usamen ki is sachajhooth ke bhanvar mein phansana hee nahin chaah raha tha
jo ho chuka hai isako kuredana vah isalie nahin chaahata tha ki usakee part ke peechhe chhipa ghaav bahut zahareela tha
tum vaastav mein bahut bade dil vaalee ho veena
dev ne usase kaha phir apanee sigaret bujha dee aur veena ko apanee baanhon mein le liya
veena ke badan mein jhurajhureesee daud gaee
ek kshan pashchaat hee sanyat hokar dev se usane vinateeyukt svar mein kaha  aapako ek vaayada karana hoga mujhase
ek nahin hajaar bolo
dev ne kaha
vah veena par sarvasv nyauchhaavar karane ko taiyaar tha
bas keval ek hee aap aaj ke baad kisee se bhee is vishay mein koee baat nahin karoge
na apane kisee bhaee se aur na hee mere kisee parivaar ke sadasy se
aapakee har pareshaanee mein main aapake saath rahoongee aur main nahin chaahatee ki main apaneeaapakee kisee baat kee raay apane kisee parivaar ke sadasy se loon
kuchh rukee veena
punah bolee  main nahin chaahatee ki main apane maataapita bhaeebahanon ko aisa kuchh bata kar unakee chintae vyarth mein badha doon
aap kah rahe hain aur mujhe vishvaas hai ki aapako kuchh aur nahin hoga
unako kuchh bataoongee to vyarth mein vah chinta karenge
mere maataapita ne ham sab bahanon ko achchhee shiksha dilaee hai
badee kathin paristhitiyon mein unhonne hamen paalapos kar bada kiya hai
main unhen aur chinta karate nahin dekh sakatee
aur meree sabase badee tamanna hai ki mera apana ek ghar ho chhotaasa
jahaan main aur tum bina kisee ke dakhal ke apana jeevan vyateet kar saken
dev veena ke shabd sunakar aatmavibhor ho utha tha
bola  veena
tumhaare vichaar jaanakar mujhe lag raha hai main bahut bhaagyashaalee hoon
tum jo kahogee main vaisa hee karoonga
phir kuchh ruk kar bola  ab ham apanee baaten yaheen samaapt karen
bahut raat ho gaee hai aur tum bhee do raaton se theek se nahin so sakee ho
hamen ab aaraam karana chaahie
itana kahakar dev ne battee band kar dee
aur palang par let gaya
neend koson door thee donon kee aankhon se
shaadee kee doosaree raat dev veena ko chhoona chaahata tha
use sahalaana chaahata tha
use pyaar dena chaahata tha
usase sahavaas kee ichchha thee
lekin jhijhak raha tha
jo lalak thee usamen veena ko pyaar dene kee veena se pyaar paane kee vah dab gaee thee
yahee chaah raha tha ki veena use chhoo le bas itanee bhar pahal vah kar le shesh vah sab karega
aur udhar veena andhere kamare mein seedhee letee chhat mein kuchh aakrtiyaan banateebigadatee dekhane kee koshish kar rahee thee
man mein usake bhee chaah balavatee hotee ja rahee thee ki saath lagabhag chhah inch door leta dev use ab chhoo le
premil kshanon kee chaah kis aurat mein nahin hotee kise achchha nahin lagata purush ka sparsh
is chuppee ko kaun tode is chuppee se to aur adhik dooree badh jaegee
abhee to man maan nahin raha veena ka ki kabhee kuchh hua bhee tha dev ke saath
abhee to yahee chaah hai ki jis khushee se usane dev se shaadee kee hai usamen chaarachaand lag jaen
dev use chhoo le
dev use sahala le
vah dev ka pyaar pa le
aur usake pyaar mein kho jae
bhool jae sab
bhool jae ki jo ho chuka hai usamen usaka bhavishy nahin chhipa
jo ho raha hai aur jo aage hoga vahee usaka bhavishy hai
vahee naee raah banaega
vahee nae sapanon ka nirmaan karega
jo sukh ab use milane ja raha hai
jo sukh use milega vahee usaka bhavishy sanvaarega
vahee sukh
usake nae jeevan mein naene roop banaega
dev ke sansarg ke sukh se oopar use kuchh nahin lag raha tha
dev ke sparsh ko paane ko vah bhee betaab thee
jo pahale tanaav se mukt hoga vahee aage badh paega
aur donon ekasaath is tanaav se mukt hone ko taiyaar hone kee cheshta karane lage
dev ne halke se haath badhaaya
veena bhee apana haath badha rahee thee aur palabhar mein hee haathon ka sparsh donon ne mahasoos kiya
agale hee pal donon ekadoosare kee or badh gae the
prem kee deevaanagee mein aalinganabaddh ho gae donon
kamare mein andhera tha aur baahar chaandanee raat thee
samudr mein toophaan aa gaya tha
laharen ekadoosare ka aalingan kar rahee theen
do laharen ooncha uthakar aasamaan ko chhoone ko betaab theen jaise ek ho jaane kee chaah thee unamen
ek hee ginatee ho ek hee kahalaen jaise vah donon
veena ko yah toophaan bahut achchha lag raha tha
dev ka sparsh dev ka aalingan use nae yug kee shurooaat lag rahee thee
abhee toophaan joron par tha ki dev kee umangon kee lahar ekaek dheelee pad gaee
dev ekaek past ho gaya
ekaek bijalee kaundhee aur dev ko nidhaal kar gaee
vah apanee saanson ko aur adhik na rok paaya
lekin veena ka toophaan apanee gati abhee banae tha
vah dev ko apane se alag na kar paee
dev ke haath ko usane apane shareer se alag na hone diya
jaise bijalee ka karant chalane par bhee shareer apanee gati nahin pakad pa raha tha
dev ke man ko veena ke man kee pahachaan karanee thee
vah nidhaal tha magar veena kee ichchha ko jaan gaya
vah veena ke har ang ko sahalaata raha
use laga veena ko aanand mil raha hai
vah ruka nahin bas usakee anguliyaan veena ke shareer mein ekek karake pravesh karatee raheen aur veena bhee chand minaton mein shaant ho gaee
veena ko yah sukh kaisa laga yah nahin jaan paaya vah
poochh bhee nahin saka usase
bas aise hee donon kee aankh lag gaeen
subah mahasoos hua use ki dev usase phir lipata hua hai
vah pyaar paane ko utaaroo hai
jaise beetee raat ka toophaan phir se bekaaboo ho gaya hai
lekin yah toophaan veena ko chand minaton ka laga
dev phir se nidhaal ho gaya
veena kuchh samajh na paee
abhee vah kuchh sochatee ki dev ne phir se sigaret sulaga lee aur kash lete hue bola  veena mujhe maaph karana
main svayan ko maanasik tanaav se mukt nahin kar pa raha
mere is tanaav ko anyatha na lena
main jald hee is tanaav se mukt ho jaoonga aur sab theek ho jaega
veena kya kahatee sunakar chup hee rahee
dev ke vyaktitv kee is kamajoree ko bhee veena ne daba liya apane man ke bheetar
apane man kee baat apane mein hee chhipaaye rahatee thee
teen din rahe the vah deharaadoon aur geeta ne apanee har samasya ka samaadhaan pa liya tha
ek madhyam vargeey shikshit parivaar kya chaahata hai ekamaatr yahee chaah hotee hai ki jaisee shiksha ve apane bachchon ko de rahe hain vaisa hee jeevan saathee unhen mil jae
achchhee naukaree vaala hoga to jeevan sudhar jaega unake bachche ka
aise mein dev ko paakar veena ke maataapita phoole nahin samaate the
aur dev ne bhee apane priyadarshee svabhaav se unhen apana divaana bana diya tha
sabase patravyavahaar usakee dinacharya ka ek ang ban gaya tha
aise mein kaheen kisee bhee bhaav se veena ne kisee ko bhee is baat kee bhanak nahin padane dee ki dev ke shareer mein kaheen kuchh kamee hai
haan deharaadoon mein sabane ek baat jaroor not kee thee ki subahasavere dev ko pateela bhar kar garm paanee kee jaroorat padatee hai
baatharoom mein vah lagabhag paun ghanta lagaata hai
kaaran chaahakar bhee koee na poochh saka
na dev se na veena se
aakhir koee shanka aur kaheen dikhatee tabhee yah bhaav kuchh ulte roop se man mein aata
aise mein veena ke man kee baat veena kee nijee baat hee hokar rah gaee
vahee dev kee dinacharya se parichit thee
dev subah chhah baje uth jaata tha
tab vah jaldee se chaay banaakar le aatee thee
tatpashchaat usake lie vah ek bada pateela bhar kar paanee garam karatee thee
yah paanee vah pahale apane krtrim maladvaar se pamp karake bheetar karata tha phir usee tarah pamp karake paanee aur shareer ka saara mal baahar nikaalata tha
veena ne pahale din yah prakriya dekhane kee ichchha jaahir kee thee aur dev ke na nukar karane par bhee nahin maanee thee
dev tab use rok nahin saka tha aur veena baatharoom mein usake paas khadee hokar dekhatee rahee thee
is prakriya ke dauraan use kaee baar ubakaee aane ko huee lekin usane use roke rakha
dev ko is prakriya mein lagabhag paun ghanta lag jaata tha
isase vah thak bhee jaata tha
lekin opareshan ke baad lage baig se yah prakriya adhik suvidhaapoorn thee
lagabhag chaibees ghante use koee pareshaanee nahin hotee thee
naha dhokar das baje ke lagabhag dev kolej chala jaata tha aur do baje vaapis lautata tha
khaana khaakar ek ghanta tak apanee risarch ka kaam karata tha
veena ko usakee padhaee karane kee aadat bahut achchhee lagatee thee
dev ka ganit kee ati vikasit shaakha ka goodh gyaan usakee samajh se pare tha
is beech vah dev ke lie kuchh na kuchh khaane ko banaatee rahatee thee
saat baje ke baad donon ghoomane nikal jaate the
ekadedh ghante baad laut kar veena rasoeeghar mein apanee saas ka haath bantaane ke lie ghus jaatee thee aur dev kisee patrika ke panne palatata rahata tha
